title: The Royal tour: the West Indies
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Jamaica - Description and travel

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Visits of state
description: In the year of her coronation, Queen Elizabeth and Prince Philip are shown visiting the West Indies (Jamaica) and Panama (Panama Canal). Sequences include - Jamaica: arrival ceremony; procession to Kingston; military parade; children's display and Panama: street scenes; folk dances; workings of canal.
